title: Stuck at buy RP screen.
body:
Hi there, just wondering if anyone else is having any similar issue to what I am having after trying to purchase RP with credit cards.
Payment has processed through my bank account and funds have been withdrawn but do I exit the screen, is it safe?
Just wondering if anyone has any advice.

Cheers.

replies.body:
How long did it hang like that? And did it work?

What I would do is wait until my rp at the top right had increased before closing it.
